title: Oracle

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, select a player who died the night before. Choose who you think killed them. If correct, you are told so. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At night, you may speak with the dead, appearing as the Oracle.
- After death, you may Manifest to a player at night, sending one message to them up to 10 words long at the end of the night. You may only do this once.
